/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight under a clear blue sky. Dominating the center of the frame is a tall white building, its height accentuated by the perspective from which the photo is taken. To the left, a bus stop waits patiently, ready to serve the city's public transportation needs. On the right, a traffic light stands sentinel, guiding the flow of vehicles and pedestrians alike. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, their colors muted against the stark white of the buildings. In the distance, trees rise up, their green foliage providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. The image is a snapshot of city life, a moment frozen in time amidst the constant motion of the metropolis.
